description: CLI argument mapping and validation rules

help_descriptions.nodes: Number of network nodes in the simulation
help_descriptions.neighbors: Number of connections each node has to other nodes
help_descriptions.miners: Number of mining nodes competing to mine blocks
help_descriptions.hashrate: Computing power per miner (in hashes per second)
help_descriptions.wallets: Number of wallet instances generating transactions
help_descriptions.transactions: Number of transactions each wallet will send
help_descriptions.blocks: Total number of blocks to mine before stopping
help_descriptions.print: Print summary every N blocks (0 = no periodic output)
help_descriptions.chain: Blockchain type (btc, bch, ltc, doge, memo)
help_descriptions.years: Simulate blockchain for specified number of years
help_descriptions.halving: Block interval for reward halving events
help_descriptions.help: Show this help message and available options
